about.summary: Retrieve, map and summarize data from the 'VertNet.org'  archives (<http://vertnet.org/>).  Functions allow searching by many  parameters, including 'taxonomic' names, places, and dates. In addition,  there is an interface for conducting spatially delimited searches, and  another for requesting large 'datasets' via email.

name: r-rvertnet
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "0.8.0" %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}
{% set native = 'm2w64-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-rvertnet
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/rvertnet_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/rvertnet/rvertnet_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: f6e6ff9691524db9e40f894755fa6ff7d5cb077288754b09a19e04cbbe7f13c9

build:
  merge_build_host: True  # [win]
  number: 1
  noarch: generic
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
  host:
    - r-base
    - r-crul >=0.5.2
    - r-dplyr >=0.5.0
    - r-ggplot2
    - r-jsonlite >=1.5
    - r-maps
  run:
    - r-base
    - r-crul >=0.5.2
    - r-dplyr >=0.5.0
    - r-ggplot2
    - r-jsonlite >=1.5
    - r-maps

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('rvertnet')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('rvertnet')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://github.com/ropensci/rvertnet
  license: MIT
  license_file: LICENSE
  summary: Retrieve, map and summarize data from the 'VertNet.org'  archives (<http://vertnet.org/>).  Functions
    allow searching by many  parameters, including 'taxonomic' names, places, and dates.
    In addition,  there is an interface for conducting spatially delimited searches,
    and  another for requesting large 'datasets' via email.
  license_family: MIT

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r

# Package: rvertnet
# Title: Search 'Vertnet', a 'Database' of Vertebrate Specimen Records
# Description: Retrieve, map and summarize data from the 'VertNet.org'  archives (<http://vertnet.org/>).  Functions allow searching by many  parameters, including 'taxonomic' names, places, and dates. In addition,  there is an interface for conducting spatially delimited searches, and  another for requesting large 'datasets' via email.
# Version: 0.7.0
# Authors@R: c( person("Scott", "Chamberlain", role = c("aut", "cre"), email = "myrmecocystus@gmail.com", comment = "http://orcid.org/0000-0003-1444-9135"), person("Chris", "Ray", role = "ctb"), person("Vijay", "Barve", role = "ctb") )
# License: MIT + file LICENSE
# LazyData: true
# URL: https://github.com/ropensci/rvertnet
# BugReports: https://github.com/ropensci/rvertnet/issues
# VignetteBuilder: knitr
# Imports: jsonlite (>= 1.5), crul (>= 0.5.2), dplyr (>= 0.5.0), ggplot2, maps
# Suggests: testthat, knitr
# RoxygenNote: 6.0.1
# X-schema.org-applicationCategory: Data Access
# X-schema.org-keywords: species, occurrences, biodiversity, maps, vertnet, mammals, mammalia, specimens
# X-schema.org-isPartOf: "https://ropensci.org"
# NeedsCompilation: no
# Packaged: 2018-04-17 16:49:00 UTC; sckott
# Author: Scott Chamberlain [aut, cre] (<https://orcid.org/0000-0003-1444-9135>), Chris Ray [ctb], Vijay Barve [ctb]
# Maintainer: Scott Chamberlain <myrmecocystus@gmail.com>
# Repository: CRAN
# Date/Publication: 2018-04-17 17:25:43 UTC
smithy_version:
No azure token. Create a token and
put it in ~/.conda-smithy/azure.token
3.7.0
